summary:
I am currently an Inria postdoctoral researcher in the [DEVINE team](https://devine.inria.fr/), under the supervision of [Nathalie Bertrand](https://people.rennes.inria.fr/Nathalie.Bertrand/).

My research interests include (and are not limited to):

  * Automata theory,
  * Active and passive automata learning,
  * Timed automata,
  * Formal verification,
  * Game theory.

My PhD was jointly supervised by [Véronique Bruyère](https://web.umons.ac.be/fs-informatique/equipes/veronique-bruyere/) (University of Mons) and [Guillermo A. Pérez](https://gaperez64.github.io/) (University of Antwerp). I defended my thesis on September 11, 2024. More details can be consulted on a [dedicated page](thesis.html).

This website will soon go under reconstruction. Consult the PDF version for my complete resume, which includes explanations for some items: [PDF](gaetan_staquet.pdf).

address.street: Campus de Beaulieu IRISA/Inria Rennes, 263 avenue du Général Leclerc
